document_data.mainbody:
The City Guard of Ordulin served as the main line of defense and police force for the city.
Captain Raithspur was the leader of the city guard in the . He commanded 2,000 guardsmen. Guardsmen were armed with variety of weaponry including halberds, maces, long swords, and daggers. All guardsmen wore plate mail.
The city guard occasionally served as the standing army for the city, but they mainly policed the streets.
